org.graalvm.shadowed.org.jline.utils

Class AttributedString

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.graalvm.shadowed.org.jline.utils.AttributedCharSequence
      • org.graalvm.shadowed.org.jline.utils.AttributedString
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    CharSequence

    public class AttributedString
extends AttributedCharSequence
    Attributed string. Instances of this class are immutables. Substrings are created without any memory copy.
